detail.description: Details pertaining to the policy result.

endedAt.description: The end of the policy application.

exitStatus.description: The 32-bit unsigned exit status from the applying the policy.

id.description: ObjectId uniquely identifying a Policy Result.

policyID.description: ObjectId uniquely identifying the parent Policy.

startedAt.description: The start of the policy application.

state.description: Enumeration describing the state of the policy. Success, failed, or pending.

stdErr.description: The STDERR output from applying the policy.

stdOut.description: The STDOUT output from applying the policy.

success.description: True if the policy was successfully applied; false otherwise.

systemID.description: ObjectId uniquely identifying the parent System.
